EmailTemplate.description: Automated email acknowledgment for recurring gifts
EmailTemplate.name: Recurring Gift Acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for supporting {!Organization.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Gift__c.Constituent_Name__c},
Your {!cv_pkg_dev_I__Gift__c.Recurring_Frequency_lowercase__c} recurring gift of {!Gift__c.Expected_Amount__c} to HN Foundation has been received - thank you!
Please accept our thanks for your support of HN Foundation. The collective power of giving has a tremendous impact on our ability to develop financial products and services that support women and girls from poor and low income families to improve the quality of their lives.
PS - Please ask your Human Resources team if your organization or company offers a Matching Gifts Program which could double your impact and support.
Sincerely,
John Smith, CEO HN Foundation
HN Foundation is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization. If you have any questions, please email development@HNFoundation.org.
